text:
@RepAdamSchiff C’mon man

“Coronavirus-Mass jail, prison releases leave some Bay Area inmates on the streets. Prisoners in CA released due to virus
Bay Area inmates are being released in unprecedented droves”

Must SOUND true even if Manafort is in the vulnerable group.
